notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: D.S., V.E., G.O. and E.H. designed the study. A.M.S.R. and V.E. performed DOE anticandidal activity and cytotoxicity bioassays. D.S. and V.E. performed GC-MS analyses. D.S., E.H. and G.O. performed statistical analyses. D.S. prepared Figure 1â€“3, and E.H. prepared tables and supplementary data tables. D.S. and E.H. drafted the manuscript. N.A. and G.O. revised the manuscript and offered critical inputs. All authors read the final manuscript and agreed to its submission.
